info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22684
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;parisregion.eu.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22684
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;parisregion.eu.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
parisregion.eu.	60	IN	SOA	dns111.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2025011200 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18939
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;parisregion.eu.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18939
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;parisregion.eu.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
parisregion.eu.	3600	IN	TXT	"1|www.parisregion.eu"
parisregion.eu.	3600	IN	TXT	"_globalsign-domain-verification=SdNHo7N6SgNJLuB9K-ZOtOfqGeecrF_PH3yMR73IlS"

info.name: DNSSEC Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) are enabled. The Delegation of Signing (DS) record provides information about a signed zone file when DNSSEC enabled.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8240
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8240
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;parisregion.eu.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
parisregion.eu.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx4.mail.ovh.net.
parisregion.eu.	3600	IN	MX	10 mx3.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST /parisregionfp.html/ HTTP/1.1
Host: parisregion.eu
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 254 Cache-Control: max-age=0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 01:29:42 GMT Expires: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 01:29:42 GMT Location: https://www.parisregion.eu/parisregionfp.html/ Server: Apache 301 Moved Permanently

Moved Permanently

The document has moved here.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: parisregion.eu' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://parisregion.eu/parisregionfp.html/#welcome'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
